seo.title: Manarola Restaurants 2025 | Best Seafood & Wine Dining
seo.description: Discover the best restaurants in Manarola. Fresh seafood, local wine, and spectacular sunset views while you dine.

body.title: Restaurants in Manarola
body.subtitle: Intimate dining with spectacular views. Fresh seafood, local wines, and traditional Ligurian cuisine in the most photogenic village.

features.title: Nessun Dorma
features.description: Legendary sunset terrace. Focaccia, antipasti plates, and local wine with stunning views.

features.title: Trattoria dal Billy
features.description: Family-run for generations. Fresh catch daily and homemade pasta overlooking the sea.

features.title: Ristorante Marina Piccola
features.description: Harbor-side location. Seafood specialties and romantic ambiance.

features.title: La Scogliera
features.description: Hidden gem on the rocks. Traditional recipes and incredible water views.

features.title: Trattoria Il Porticciolo
features.description: Cozy atmosphere in the main square. Pasta, seafood, and local wines.

features.title: Aristide
features.description: Modern Ligurian cuisine with creative twists on traditional dishes.
